Package transbit.tbits.common

Interface Summary
IResourceManager This interface is implemented by all the other resource managers in tbits.
PropertiesEnum This class has the list of keys for the database related properties, which the DataSourcePool will look for in the properties file through the PropertiesHandler for using DataSourcePool as a static factory of connections.
 

Class Summary
ActionFileInfo  
Configuration This class looks for the following system properties passed to the application through java -D command line option: app.name: [Mandatory]
This property should hold the name of the application.
ConnectionProperties  
CSVImportConfig  
CSVImportProcessor  
DataSourcePool This class maintains a pool of connections to the database through the Primrose connection pooler.
DomainClassGenerator This class generates a java class file that contains the following: The Prologue about the copyright.
DTagReplacer This class reads a file with DTags and replaces them with the specified text.
HashUtilities Provides utility functions to calculate the hash of any file.
Mail This class contains utility methods to send mails using /usr/lib/sendmail.
MailEnvelope  
MailProcessor The MailProcessor class reads the inputstream of email message and forms a Java Mime Message object.
MailQueue  
MailResourceManager Manages the mail resource session
MailTransportEngine  
MyWordTokenizer  
PropertiesHandler This class encapsulates the system-specific and application-specific properties and provides methods to read(accessor methods) and change(mutator methods) them.
PropertiesHandler.MailProperties  
ScaytSpellCheckServlet  
SpellCheckServlet  
StreamGobbler This class is used to gobble up (read) the error stream of a process in a separate thread.
TBitsAppender This class extends the ConsoleAppender and overrides the append method to send out emails depending on the level of the log message and the level configured for sending mails.
TBitsFileAppender This class extends the DailyRollingFileAppender of Log4java and overrides the append method to send out emails.
TBitsFileInfo  
TBitsLogger This class is a wrapper over the Logger class provided by Log4Java.
TBitsResourceManager Takes all resource Managers and commits or rollbacks all of them at once.
TBitsSpellChecker  
Timestamp This class is a subclass of java.util.Date with additional methods that are generally used during manipulation of date fields.
TransbitAuthenticator  
TUser This class is a wrapper that accesses the TBits's user database through its http api.
Uploader Servlet implementation class Uploader
Utilities This class provides utility services that are generally used in web applications
 

Enum Summary
TUser.OutputFormat  
 

Exception Summary
DatabaseException This class encapsulates the exceptions thrown during interaction with the database.
